title: I GOT PERMABANNED
body: So I was playing with a four man premade that reported me on the basis that I was salty and flamed them after they aggravated me.  I totally 100% that my attitude was unnecessary and absolutely unacceptable. I have so much invested in this account and this game.  I have played this game for something around 4 years and have dedicated time and money into this game and account.  I would be destroyed if it were to end like this.  I will take a 2 week ban, a one month ban, a one month chat ban!  Whatever!  I just want to join my group on the rift and create more memories and meet more people.  Although I have flamed in the past (most people do at some point, but that's beside the point), I want to change from my ways.  And only you, rito can do that.  Please hear me out.  I know riot games will come through for me in one way or another.  Thank you.

replies.body:
> I know riot games will come through for me in one way or another.

Considering you yourself admitted to being toxic, it seems like a justified ban. You're welcome to make a new account though, maybe losing everything from that one will be enough to get you to change.

I'd be surprised if everyone wasn't salty at one point or another.  Another point is that I have never been suspended.  I have got chat restrictions but never a suspension...so to jump straight to a permaban seems extreme to me.
I think if someone throws money into an account then @riot should at least issue a 1 year ban at most depending on the situation.

Everyone has bad games, but to get perma-banned you need to be consistently toxic or have been incredibly toxic in one game to the point where it warranted an immediate permaban. Either way it is deserved.  

If you are truly capable of reforming, you can prove it by making another account and not being toxic enough to be banned. However forget about your perma-banned account, it is gone, you broke the rules and it is your punishment.
You had enough chances to change.
I have never got a suspension.  Only chat bans.  And then straight to a permaban.
then you said something pretty bad

Being salty is not bannable, but flaming is.
Riot banned you due to the amount of reports you were reciving which had alot of discription, ive perma banned atleast 9 people and i send a ticket to riot.
If you do not have a job you should stop charging money and buying skins and your champ collection?(i know, its hard)
But Riot offers redemption in a way, make a new account. unlike alot of games you arent able to make accounts after your IP has been blacklisted.
and if you dont think this is justified, riot now review all reports on players, unlike the past where they got a bot set up.
